caller_intent: The caller wants to check their insurance account status and address an automatic payment issue, as they received a ticket and are concerned about a draft scheduled for the same day.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms the caller's policyholder name (Jermaine Lane) and accesses their account.
Agent checks the policy and confirms it is set up for automatic draft payment.
Agent explains that the payment cannot be stopped without the social security number.
Agent offers to connect the caller with another agent for further assistance.
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance internal policy/account lookup system
summary: The caller contacted Alliance Insurance to address an automatic payment issue and check their account status. The agent confirmed the policy was set up for auto-draft but could not stop the payment without the social security number. The agent offered to transfer the call to another agent for further assistance.
